page.title: 15SHEERNESS DOCKS
page.content: SHEERNESS IS A BUSY GENERAL IMPORT/EXPORT DOCK.IN 1985 THERE ARE JUST OVER 1000 PEOPLE CONNECTED WITH SHEERNESS DOCKS. SHEERNESS DOCKS HANDLE MANY DIFFERENT IMPORTS AND EXPORTS. THE MAIN ONES ARE:IMPORTS - JAPANESE CARS,FROZEN MEAT,FRUIT,FOREST PRODUCTS FOR PAPER. EXPORTS - CHEMICALS,STEEL, MEDICINES. THE DOCKYARD SOMETIMES HAS SLACK PERIODS DUE TO THE SEASONAL NATURE OF FRUIT PRODUCTION WHILE PEOPLE WORKING ON THE CAR SECTION HAVE A STEADY JOB THE WHOLE YEAR THROUGH. IN SHEERNESS DOCKYARD WORK IS VERY PHYSICALLY HARD AS THEY HAVE VERY FEW MACHINES.IT CAN ALSO BE DANGEROUS DUE TO THE CRANES WHICH WORK OVERHEAD AND FORKLIFT TRUCKS CARRYING GOODS TO AND FROM THE BOATS.
